message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While your offer is tempting, the value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,225,000. This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,150,000. Can we agree on this price?
